title: 15 Best Bed Frames on Amazon 2024 for Every Style and Budget
description: Support your mattress and elevate your bedroom with our top picks
author: Sarah Madaus, Will Porter
excerpt: To support your twin, queen, Cal king, or king mattress, shop the best bed frames on Amazon from Zinus, Linenspa, Lucid, and more
text: Two things can be true: You need a bed frame that’ll fit your bedroom design and you need it to ship in speedy fashion. The best bed frames on Amazon check both boxes and are sturdy, stylish, and affordable. Not to mention, they’ll be at your doorstep in a few days if you have an Amazon Prime membership.We scoured the retailer to find the best bed frames on Amazon that suit all kinds of styles, sleepers, and price points. You’ll find everything from upholstered and tufted options to minimalist wood platforms and strong canopy foundations. Even better, many have storage compartments to help you stay organized and don’t require box springs. Stock is constantly changing, so if you see one you like, add it to your cart ASAP. If you snooze, you lose (pun intended).Prices reflect queen-size beds. However, most of them are available in additional sizes.Our Top Picks for the Best Amazon Bed Frames:Best Overall Bed Frame: Zinus Wen Wood Platform Bed Frame, $170Best Wood Bed Frame: Zinus Linda Platform Bed Frame With Wood Headboard, $599Best Metal Bed Frame: Zinus 18-inch SmartBase Mattress Foundation, $96Best Platform Bed Frame: Mellow Classic Solid Wood Platform Bed Frame, $184Best Wingback Bed Frame: Allewie Wingback Bed Frame With Storage Drawers, $250Best Canopy Bed Frame: YitaHome Canopy Bed Frame, $152Best Upholstered Bed Frame: Mr. Kate Daphne Platform Bed Frame, $305Best Overall Bed Frame: Zinus Wen Wood Platform Bed FrameZinus Wen Wood Platform Bed FrameIf you’re on the hunt for a high-quality bed frame that’s designed to stand the test of time, turn to the Zinus Wen Wood Platform Bed Frame. While it doesn’t come with extras like charging ports you can find in some modern models, it has a wood frame and solid steel interior to give it lasting durability. The wood slats also offer stability and a strong foundation for a mattress—no box spring required. As a finishing touch, it’s defined by a rustic, cherry-finish design that’s ideal for farmhouse-style spaces.AD contributor Will Porter has this frame in his home and raves about its quality. “When my partner and I were looking to buy a frame, we really just wanted something that looked nice, was affordable, and wouldn’t fall apart quickly,” he says. “It looks great; the cherry finish is versatile and doesn’t look cheap. We actually thought it looked quite a bit like the Thuma bed, which we may get someday, but wasn’t in the budget when we were shopping over a year ago. So, looks-wise, this was a big win, especially at just $170.”Rustic design, wood slats add solid foundation for a mattress, affordableSome customers mention screw looseness in reviewsBrown, cherry, natural, rustic pineBest Wood Bed Frame: Zinus Linda Platform Bed Frame With Wood HeadboardZINUS Linda Mid-Century Wood Platform Bed FrameFor anyone still navigating their personal sense of interior design, we recommend choosing a bed frame that will fit a number of different styles. Commerce director Rachel Fletcher thinks this easy-to-assemble best seller lives up to the hype, saying “For the price, I truly don’t think the quality can be beat. And the style of the Linda is pretty agnostic—it’s a little mid-century, a little Scandinavian—so much so that I can imagine it fitting into a host of home decor aesthetics, from a cozy cabin to something more minimalist or beachy or boho!”Versatile design, easy assembly, affordable price pointAssembly took longer than the instructions suggestedBest Metal Bed Frame: Zinus 18-inch SmartBase Mattress FoundationZinus Shawn 18-inch SmartBase Mattress FoundationSenior digital design editor Zoë Sessums tested this Zinus metal platform bed frame, which comes together in under 10 minutes. “The bed frame is easy to move around [and] high enough to give you ample storage space,” she says. “It didn’t squeak, it didn’t creak, and the mattress stayed exactly where I put it.” If you want extra reinforcement, it comes with long, narrow adhesive strips that you can affix to your mattress to keep it from shifting.Easy assembly, affordable, stable foundationTwin, Twin XL, Full, Queen, King, California KingBest Platform Bed Frame: Mellow Classic Solid Wood Platform Bed FrameMellow Classic Solid Wood Platform Bed FrameWith nearly 16,000 five-star reviews, this minimalist wood bed is a good option for anyone on a budget who still wants a sleek, put-together look. It has wood slats so you don’t need a box spring and lifts high enough off the ground that you can slide storage containers underneath. It has a platform design with side rails to keep your mattress from moving, plus center legs for more stability.Mid-century modern design, soft fabric, side rails to keep mattress in placeSome customers mention that bed frame color looks different than pictured online in reviewsBlue velvet, dark grey linen, light grey velvet, olive green velvet, white velvetBest Mid-Century-Modern Bed Frame: Caden Deluxe Bed Frame With Adjustable HeadboardCaden Deluxe Bed Frame with Adjustable HeadboardThis low-profile Acacia wood frame adds a rustic touch to your boudoir. You can adjust the headboard from 39 to 45 inches, so if you have a loftier mattress, you’ll still have something to lean on when you’re propped in bed. The frame also comes with Velcro strips for a non-slip mattress setup.Keeps mattress steady, no box spring required, easy assemblySome customers mention in reviews that screws are strippedBlack, caramel, dark brown, dark chocolate, mocha, walnutTwin, Full, Queen, Queen US, King, King USBest Linen Bed Frame: Nectar Bed Frame & HeadboardNectar Bed Frame & HeadboardNectar knows mattresses, and, as it turns out, they know their stuff when it comes to bed frames too. Their bed frame and headboard is started with a steel frame and finished with upholstered linen fabric. html:
Two things can be true: You need a bed frame that’ll fit your bedroom design and you need it to ship in speedy fashion. The best bed frames on Amazon check both boxes and are sturdy, stylish, and affordable. Not to mention, they’ll be at your doorstep in a few days if you have an Amazon Prime membership.

We scoured the retailer to find the best bed frames on Amazon that suit all kinds of styles, sleepers, and price points. You’ll find everything from upholstered and tufted options to minimalist wood platforms and strong canopy foundations. Even better, many have storage compartments to help you stay organized and don’t require box springs. Stock is constantly changing, so if you see one you like, add it to your cart ASAP. If you snooze, you lose (pun intended).

Prices reflect queen-size beds. However, most of them are available in additional sizes.

Our Top Picks for the Best Amazon Bed Frames:

  • Best Overall Bed Frame: Zinus Wen Wood Platform Bed Frame, $170
  • Best Wood Bed Frame: Zinus Linda Platform Bed Frame With Wood Headboard, $599
  • Best Metal Bed Frame: Zinus 18-inch SmartBase Mattress Foundation, $96
  • Best Platform Bed Frame: Mellow Classic Solid Wood Platform Bed Frame, $184
  • Best Wingback Bed Frame: Allewie Wingback Bed Frame With Storage Drawers, $250
  • Best Canopy Bed Frame: YitaHome Canopy Bed Frame, $152
  • Best Upholstered Bed Frame: Mr. Kate Daphne Platform Bed Frame, $305

Best Overall Bed Frame: Zinus Wen Wood Platform Bed Frame

Zinus Wen Wood Platform Bed Frame

If you’re on the hunt for a high-quality bed frame that’s designed to stand the test of time, turn to the Zinus Wen Wood Platform Bed Frame. While it doesn’t come with extras like charging ports you can find in some modern models, it has a wood frame and solid steel interior to give it lasting durability. The wood slats also offer stability and a strong foundation for a mattress—no box spring required. As a finishing touch, it’s defined by a rustic, cherry-finish design that’s ideal for farmhouse-style spaces.

AD contributor Will Porter has this frame in his home and raves about its quality. “When my partner and I were looking to buy a frame, we really just wanted something that looked nice, was affordable, and wouldn’t fall apart quickly,” he says. “It looks great; the cherry finish is versatile and doesn’t look cheap. We actually thought it looked quite a bit like the Thuma bed, which we may get someday, but wasn’t in the budget when we were shopping over a year ago. So, looks-wise, this was a big win, especially at just $170.”

Rustic design, wood slats add solid foundation for a mattress, affordable

Some customers mention screw looseness in reviews

Brown, cherry, natural, rustic pine

Best Wood Bed Frame: Zinus Linda Platform Bed Frame With Wood Headboard

ZINUS Linda Mid-Century Wood Platform Bed Frame

For anyone still navigating their personal sense of interior design, we recommend choosing a bed frame that will fit a number of different styles. Commerce director Rachel Fletcher thinks this easy-to-assemble best seller lives up to the hype, saying “For the price, I truly don’t think the quality can be beat. And the style of the Linda is pretty agnostic—it’s a little mid-century, a little Scandinavian—so much so that I can imagine it fitting into a host of home decor aesthetics, from a cozy cabin to something more minimalist or beachy or boho!”

Versatile design, easy assembly, affordable price point

Assembly took longer than the instructions suggested

Best Metal Bed Frame: Zinus 18-inch SmartBase Mattress Foundation

Zinus Shawn 18-inch SmartBase Mattress Foundation

Senior digital design editor Zoë Sessums tested this Zinus metal platform bed frame, which comes together in under 10 minutes. “The bed frame is easy to move around [and] high enough to give you ample storage space,” she says. “It didn’t squeak, it didn’t creak, and the mattress stayed exactly where I put it.” If you want extra reinforcement, it comes with long, narrow adhesive strips that you can affix to your mattress to keep it from shifting.

Easy assembly, affordable, stable foundation

Twin, Twin XL, Full, Queen, King, California King

Best Platform Bed Frame: Mellow Classic Solid Wood Platform Bed Frame

Mellow Classic Solid Wood Platform Bed Frame

With nearly 16,000 five-star reviews, this minimalist wood bed is a good option for anyone on a budget who still wants a sleek, put-together look. It has wood slats so you don’t need a box spring and lifts high enough off the ground that you can slide storage containers underneath. Plus, it’s a great starter platform bed if you’re not ready to shell out major cash on something like the Floyd.

Top-rated pick, minimalist design, doesn’t require a box spring

Some customers note screw looseness in reviews

Black, cherry, espresso, natural pine, pine, white, white wash

Twin, Twin XL, Full, Queen, King, California King

Best Wingback Bed Frame: Allewie Wingback Bed Frame With Storage Drawers

Allewie Wingback Bed Frame with Storage Drawers

Give your room a stately feel with this heavy duty bed frame from Allewie, which looks more expensive than it actually is (a major win). It has a tufted headboard so you can snuggle up with a book comfortably, and it also has four hidden storage drawers for stashing sweaters, blankets, and anything else that doesn’t fit in your closet.

Added storage, tufted design, sturdy build

Sits lower to the ground in comparison to standard bed frames

Best Canopy Bed Frame: YitaHome Canopy Bed Frame

YITAHOME Canopy Metal Bed Frame

Have you been dreaming of a dramatic, Disney-princess-esque canopy bed since childhood? Then we found a great bed for you, as this frame provides a modern foundation for one. It comes with metal slat support, and reviewers say it’s easy to set up and feels sturdy. It’s reinforced with middle bed legs too, plus plenty of height for underbed storage.

Includes a charging port for devices, contemporary design, sturdy build

Some customers mention mattress sliding in reviews

Best Upholstered Bed Frame: Mr. Kate Daphne Platform Bed Frame

Mr. Kate Daphne Upholstered Headboard and Platform Bed Frame

Mr. Kate’s upholstered bed frame is finished with soft, ribbed velvet, plus brushed brass accents that will level up any bedroom. It has a platform design with side rails to keep your mattress from moving, plus center legs for more stability.

Mid-century modern design, soft fabric, side rails to keep mattress in place

Some customers mention that bed frame color looks different than pictured online in reviews

Blue velvet, dark grey linen, light grey velvet, olive green velvet, white velvet

Best Mid-Century-Modern Bed Frame: Caden Deluxe Bed Frame With Adjustable Headboard

Caden Deluxe Bed Frame with Adjustable Headboard

This low-profile Acacia wood frame adds a rustic touch to your boudoir. You can adjust the headboard from 39 to 45 inches, so if you have a loftier mattress, you’ll still have something to lean on when you’re propped in bed. The frame also comes with Velcro strips for a non-slip mattress setup.

Keeps mattress steady, no box spring required, easy assembly

Some customers mention in reviews that screws are stripped

Black, caramel, dark brown, dark chocolate, mocha, walnut

Twin, Full, Queen, Queen US, King, King US

Best Linen Bed Frame: Nectar Bed Frame & Headboard

Nectar Bed Frame & Headboard

Nectar knows mattresses, and, as it turns out, they know their stuff when it comes to bed frames too. Their bed frame and headboard is started with a steel frame and finished with upholstered linen fabric. It comes in gray and a natural linen color, both of which are easy to match with any interior design concept you’ve already got going. Wood slats take away the need for a box spring, and all the tools come in the box, so you can put it together with ease—even in a small apartment.

Modern design, sturdy frame, great for small spaces

Twin, Twin XL, Full, Queen, King, California King

Best Tufted Bed Frame: Lucid Upholstered Bed Frame With Headboard

Lucid Queen Bedframe with Vertical Channeled Headboard

The tufted design of this upholstered platform bed frame creates a sophisticated, elegant look—without being stuffy or old-fashioned. It has easy assembly (only seven steps, and you don’t even need to get out your drill) and it’s compatible with ergonomic adjustable bed bases. You can choose from a few neutral colors too.

No drill required for assembly, adjustable base, tufted upholstery

Black, charcoal, pearl, stone

Twin, Twin XL, Full, Queen, King, California King

Best Basic Bed Frame: Linenspa Metal Platform Bed Frame

Linenspa Metal Platform Bed Frame

Say you already have a headboard that you can’t imagine parting with. There’s no need for a bed frame that has one included. This best-selling no-frills pick from Linenspa provides a solid metal base for your mattress and nothing else. It’s fitted with steel slat support, and if you don’t like the look of metal, you can fit the base with a bed skirt. Like others on this list, it has a high clearance for more storage opportunities.

Durable build, spacious under bed storage

Twin, Twin XL, Full, Queen, King, California King

Best Storage Bed Frame: Mr. Kate Moon Upholstered Bed with Storage

Mr. Kate Moon Upholstered Bed with Storage

For small rooms that want to make their beds an aesthetic focal point, we recommend this one from Mr. Kate. It’s made with soft, velvet upholstery and has four built-in drawers that reviewers note are surprisingly roomy.

Contemporary design, comes with drawers for added bedroom storage

Limited colorway availability

Best Victorian-Inspired Bed Frame: Allewie Platform Bed Frame With Vintage Headboard

Allewie Queen Size Platform Bed Frame with Vintage Headboard

If you want to go the vintage-style route without the hassle of sourcing a vintage headboard, Allewie’s is a solid option. It has the marks of a good bed frame, according to reviewers: side rails, metal support slats, versatility, and a noise-free design.

Ideal for a traditional bedroom aesthetic, side rails to keep mattress steady, noise-free

Bed Bed Frame With an Oversized Headboard: Deinppa Luxury Bed Frame

Deinppa Luxury Bed Frame

An extended headboard is a great way to make a large bedroom feel a bit cozier. Style it with matching nightstands on either side of the bed and a big area rug to create a little room within a room. This wingback, oversized headboard and queen-size frame is finished with a royal blue velvet material, while wooden slats support can help you slide your bed in and keep it steady.

Comes with integrated lights, contemporary design, doesn’t require a box spring

Best Bed Frame With a Storage Headboard: Anctor Bed Frame With Charging Station

ANCTOR Queen Bed Frame with Charging Station

If you’re looking for a bed frame with all the bells and whistles, your search ends here. This frame from Anctor has two USB ports and two standard outlets built into the headboard for easy charging and storage that neatly tucks into the bed’s versatile dark gray linen headboard. The hardy wooden slats and the frame’s nine legs ensure that your bed makes no noise, letting you focus on nestling into that comfy memory foam mattress and get a good night’s rest. Also, if you’re looking for a king-size bed frame instead of a queen, you have that option.

USB charging ports, durable wooden slats

Some customers mention that the frame can make some noise

Emerald, rustic brown and black, vintage brown and grey

Twin, Twin XL, Full, Queen US, King US, California King

Why Buy a Bed Frame on Amazon?

Convenience
